title: What Can US Democracy Learn From Brazil?
description: Both nations had presidents who attacked their elections. But their responses — and the aftermaths — were much different.
dc:creator: Jack Nicas
media:credit: Victor Moriyama for The New York Times
media:description: Supporters of President Jair Bolsonaro blockaded a main road in São Paulo on Tuesday, one of many such protests around Brazil after he lost the election to Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva.
